content.text: It's going well, I'm excited to start my new job at UC Santa Cruz.
That's awesome! I'm a police officer, I have to run after criminals in my boots, but I still enjoy playing basketball in my free time.
That's cool! I like to play basketball too, but I'm not very good at it.
You can always practice! I'm sure you'll get better. What are you looking forward to the most about going to UC Santa Cruz?
I'm looking forward to meeting new people and learning new things. I'm also excited to be in a new environment and explore the campus.
That sounds great! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks! I think I will too. What are you looking forward to the most in your life right now?
I'm looking forward to painting murals, I aspire to be a mural artist.
That's awesome! I love murals, they're so beautiful. I've always wanted to paint one myself.
You should! It's a lot of fun. What's your favorite song by Madonna?
My favorite song by Madonna is Like a Virgin. It's such a catchy song and I love the music video.
That's a great song! I love the music video too. It's so iconic.
Yeah, it's one of my favorite music videos of all time.
Me too! It's so cool how she's riding the bull
